s1.ptxt: Confirm that lighting switch is in OFF position.
Confirm that dimmer and passing switch is in low beam position.
Check DRL for operation as follows.

s2.ptxt: Turn ignition switch to ON position and check headlights remain OFF.
Start engine and run it at idle speed. Check headlights turn ON at low beam.
Switch dimmer and passing switch to high beam position and check headlights remain tuning ON at low beam.

s1.ptxt: If a malfunction is found, go to DRL System Symptom Diagnosis (If Equipped) .
